explains: v. 持续存在，持久；忍受，忍耐（endure 的现在分词）

sentences.en: His most enduring quality is his childlike innocence.
sentences.cn: 他最持久不变的特质是孩子般的天真无邪。

sentences.en: This chance meeting was the start of an enduring friendship.
sentences.cn: 这次偶然的相遇是一段持久友情的开始。

sentences.en: However, hearing such stories is not sufficient for younger children to form enduring memories.
sentences.cn: 然而，听到这样的故事并不足以让年幼的孩子形成持久的记忆。
